mapper.update:
update t_material
id = #{t.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture_url = #{t.pictureUrl ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture_format = #{t.pictureFormat ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture_size = #{t.pictureSize ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_name = #{t.materialName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_code = #{t.materialCode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_library = #{t.materialLibrary ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{t.status ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_type = #{t.materialType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
particular_year = #{t.particularYear ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
month = #{t.month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{t.source ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
season = #{t.season ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{t.brand ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_scale = #{t.brandScale ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drawback = #{t.drawback ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assess = #{t.assess ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{t.remarks ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_code = #{t.companyCode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{t.createId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_name = #{t.createName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{t.createDate ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_id = #{t.updateId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_name = #{t.updateName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{t.updateDate ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{t.delFlag ,jdbcType=CHAR},
